Posts.Content: im havin 3 fec then 3 tax,,then lumpectomy    ,iv ad 2 fec so far and 3rd is in 10days 1st rnd was a hock ill for 5 days then acid heartburn for 5 days then felt great ,,2cnd rnd ohmg ill for 5 days then a pain in my arm were i av chemo the left bicep area is agony,,,in so much pain thats wats thrown me this time im booked for a picc line in 2 days so nxt 4 chemo shud b bit easier,,,although i feel the damage is already done,,how do u cope with ur side effects,,,i was diagnosed 11 weeks ago im 34 n this is all new to me plus im single mum to a 12yr old boy xxx
Posts.Title: About to start chemo .a question or two..?...
